laboratory_examinations.findings: Lipase level: 6930 (elevated, normal range not specified)

findings.LIVER: Echogenicity is homogeneous, contour is smooth, no focal liver mass, main portal vein patent with hepatopetal flow, no ascites.
findings.BILE DUCTS: No intrahepatic biliary dilation, CBD measures 3 mm.
findings.GALLBLADDER: No stones or gallbladder wall thickening, gallbladder sludge present.
findings.PANCREAS: Head of pancreas normal, tail and body not visualized due to gas.
findings.KIDNEYS: Right kidney 11.6 cm, left kidney 11.8 cm, simple cyst in left kidney measuring 3.4 x 3.5 x 3.4 cm, normal cortical echogenicity.
findings.RETROPERITONEUM: Visualized portions of aorta and IVC normal.
